trans-unit.source: Specifies text expression compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as configurações de compilador de expressão de texto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity of the compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a atividade das configurações do compilador.

trans-unit.source: The activity of the compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: A atividade das configurações do compilador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity for the compiler settings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da atividade para as configurações do compilador.

trans-unit.source: The name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o namespace da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O namespace da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the text expression compiler settings always generate source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as configurações do compilador de expressão texto sempre geram código-fonte.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text expression compiler settings always generate source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se as configurações do compilador de expressão texto sempre geram código-fonte; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> is for implementation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> é para implementação.

trans-unit.source: True of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> is for implementation; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: Verdadeiro para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> para implementação; caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> generates as partial class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> gera como classe parcial.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> generates as partial class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" /> gera como uma classe parcial; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the language used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o idioma usado pela <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The language used by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: O idioma usado pela <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the log source generation message for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a mensagem de geração de código-fonte do log para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The log source generation message for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de geração de código-fonte do log para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root namespace for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o namespace raiz para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The root namespace for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: O namespace raiz para o <see cref="T:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.TextExpressionCompilerSettings" />.
